features.title: Advanced Features:
features.mediapipe: MediaPipe body segmentation - Precise skin area recognition
features.shaders: Custom shader effects - Realistic skin texture blending
features.export: High-quality export - Ready for tattoo artist consultation

instructions.title: How to Use:
instructions.step1: Upload a clear body image showing the area where you want the tattoo
instructions.step2: Upload your tattoo design image (preferably with transparent background)
instructions.step3: Adjust position, size, rotation, and opacity to fit perfectly
instructions.step4: Use advanced controls to fine-tune the appearance
instructions.step5: Export the final preview to share with your tattoo artist
